message.content:
Here are some resources for a nutrition diet plan:

1. **Healthy Eating Plan**
   - **Description**: A healthy eating plan gives your body the nutrients it needs every day while staying within your daily calorie goal for weight loss.
   - **URL**: [Healthy Eating Plan](https://www.nhlbi.nih.gov/health/educational/lose_wt/eat/calories.htm)

2. **Eating a balanced diet - NHS**
   - **Description**: Food groups in your diet · eat at least 5 portions of a variety of fruit and vegetables every day (see 5 A Day) · base meals on higher fibre starchy foods like ...
   - **URL**: [Eating a balanced diet - NHS](https://www.nhs.uk/live-well/eat-well/how-to-eat-a-balanced-diet/eating-a-balanced-diet/)

3. **MyPlate.gov | U.S. Department of Agriculture**
   - **Description**: MyPlate Plan Chart. Set personal goals for healthy eating. Build healthy eating habits one goal at a time! ... Are you a health or nutrition professional? We ...
   - **URL**: [MyPlate.gov](https://www.myplate.gov/)

4. **Mediterranean Diet: Food List & Meal Plan**
   - **Description**: The Mediterranean Diet emphasizes plant-based foods and healthy fats. You eat mostly veggies, fruits and whole grains. Extra virgin olive oil is the main ...
   - **URL**: [Mediterranean Diet](https://my.clevelandclinic.org/health/articles/16037-mediterranean-diet)

5. **MyPlate Plan Calculator - MyPlate.gov**
   - **Description**: Build healthy eating habits one goal at a time! Download the Start Simple with MyPlate app today. Learn more. logo for the Dietary Guidelines for Americans.
   - **URL**: [MyPlate Plan Calculator](https://www.myplate.gov/myplate-plan)

6. **Healthy diet**
   - **Description**: Apr 29, 2020 ... (8) Guideline: Sodium intake for adults and children. Geneva: World Health Organization; 2012. (9) Comprehensive implementation plan on maternal ...
   - **URL**: [Healthy diet](https://www.who.int/news-room/fact-sheets/detail/healthy-diet)

7. **Healthy meals start with planning - Mayo Clinic**
   - **Description**: Feb 28, 2024 ... A plan for healthy eating includes knowing how much food your body needs. And then eating that amount, no more and no less. Two measurements can help you do ...
   - **URL**: [Healthy meals start with planning](https://www.mayoclinic.org/healthy-lifestyle/nutrition-and-healthy-eating/in-depth/healthy-meals/art-20546806)

8. **SNAP and the Thrifty Food Plan | Food and Nutrition Service**
   - **Description**: Jan 28, 2025 ... The Thrifty Food Plan is the cost of groceries needed to provide a healthy, budget-conscious diet for a family of four.
   - **URL**: [SNAP and the Thrifty Food Plan](https://www.fns.usda.gov/snap/thriftyfoodplan)

9. **DASH diet: Healthy eating to lower your blood pressure - Mayo Clinic**
   - **Description**: May 25, 2023 ... The DASH diet is a healthy-eating plan designed to help prevent or treat high blood pressure, also called hypertension.
   - **URL**: [DASH diet](https://www.mayoclinic.org/healthy-lifestyle/nutrition-and-healthy-eating/in-depth/dash-diet/art-20048456)

10. **USDA Food Plans | Food and Nutrition Service**
    - **Description**: USDA produces four food plans at successively higher cost levels: the Thrifty, Low-Cost, Moderate-Cost, and Liberal Food Plans.
    - **URL**: [USDA Food Plans](https://www.fns.usda.gov/research/cnpp/usda-food-plans)

These resources provide a variety of diet plans and guidelines to help you maintain a healthy and balanced diet.
